title: It's Time to Flip the Hollywood Script on Its Head
description: Amid strikes that have shut down Hollywood, Entertainmint CEO Genevieve Thiers argues that Film3 points the way to a more equitable path forward.

title: The future of payments: How blockchain is reshaping business transactions and consumer remittances
description:
Blockchain technology has made significant advancements across various sectors, but it can be challenging to distinguish between real-world applications and lofty promises. Two standout cryptocurrency use cases have begun to showcase their transformative power: business transactions and consumer remittances. Both areas currently suffer from inefficiencies in the current system, such as high fees and slow […]

The post The future of payments: How blockchain is reshaping business transactions and consumer remittances appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Biggest Movers: TRX Surges to 20-Month High on Saturday
description: Tron was one of the notable movers on Saturday, as the token broke out of a key resistance level to start the weekend. The move came as the global crypto market cap mostly consolidated during Saturday’s session. Stellar was another exception, as the token rebounded from yesterday’s loss.
